name: MOMENTO (turnipboys, Headrocks)
description:
A side scroller where you seek out your memories in the midst of a digital, vaporwave cityscape. Collect flash drives while outrunning the virus taking over!

Created for the Global Game Jam 2021.

Credits:

David Barrett: Programming, game design

Colin Spiridonov: Programming, game design

Alisa Chen: Art, game design

Owen Mech: Music & sound design, programming

Aylish Turner: Art
